configurable.i18n_description: The Josefina Soulcalifornia is A very expensive brand’s cool and contemporary skinny boyfriend jean for women. The fit is just a little bit roomy through the thigh, slim through the leg and tapers to a narrow leg opening. And who can resist 7FAM’s Soulcalifornia wash? This indigo blue stretch denim has been immaculately worn in and faded in all the right places so the fashion vote is a resounding yes to this beautiful glamour vintage jean.
configurable.i18n_description_de: Josefina Soulcalifornia heißt die coole und zeitgenössische Damenjeans mit Skinny Fit von 7 FAM , die sich an seiner Garderobe inspiriert. Der Fit ist an den Oberschenkeln etwas großzügiger, an der Beinlänge slim und läuft nach unten schmaler zu. Wer kann der Soulcalifornia-Waschung von 7FAM schon widerstehen? Dieser indagoblaue Stretch-Denim ist an allen richtigen Stellen gekonnt worn-in und ausgefärbt und verdient ganz zu Recht den Titel der absoluten Glamour-Vintage-Jeans.
configurable.i18n_description_nl: De Josefina Soulcalifornia is A very expensive brand’s coole en eigentijdse skinny boyfriend vrouwenjeans. Het model is net iets ruimer bij de dijen, aansluitend bij de benen en loopt smaller toe bij de pijpopening. En wie kan 7FAM’s Soulcalifornia wassing weerstaan? Het indigoblauwe stretchdenim is perfect afgedragen en precies op de juiste plaatsen gebleekt zodat deze mooie glamour vintage jeans met unanieme modestemmen is goedgekeurd.
configurable.i18n_description_fr: Cool et contemporain, le Josefina version Soulcalifornia est le jean boyfriend skinny pour femme de A very expensive brand. Très légèrement large sur les cuisses, il est slim au niveau des jambes et se termine par un bas de jambe resserré. Et qui peut résister au lavage Soulcalifornia de 7FAM ? Un denim stretch bleu indigo impeccablement usé et délavé aux endroits stratégiques... Les fashionistas disent oui à ce beau jean vintage et glamour à la fois.
configurable.i18n_description_it: Il Josefina Soulcalifornia è lo skinny da donna cool e contemporaneo di 7 FAM ispirato al guardaroba di lui. Il fit è appena più generoso sulla coscia e slim lungo la gamba che scende affusolata. Chi può resistere al lavaggio Soulcalifornia di 7FAM? Questo denim stretch in blu indaco è sapientemente abraso e scolorito in tutti i punti giusti, promosso a pieni voti come jeans vintage altamente glamour.
configurable.i18n_description_es: The Josefina Soulcalifornia is A very expensive brand’s cool and contemporary skinny boyfriend jean for women. The fit is just a little bit roomy through the thigh, slim through the leg and tapers to a narrow leg opening. And who can resist 7FAM’s Soulcalifornia wash? This indigo blue stretch denim has been immaculately worn in and faded in all the right places so the fashion vote is a resounding yes to this beautiful glamour vintage jean.

configurable.i18n_product_moreaboutthefit: The Josefina is our skinny boyfriend fit. It’s slightly roomy through the thigh, slim through the leg and tapers to a narrow leg opening. It can be worn cuffed or un-cuffed and features A very expensive brand’s signature squiggle back pocket.
configurable.i18n_product_moreaboutthefit_de: Unsere schmal geschnittene Boyfriend-Jeans. Sitzt locker an der Hüfte und wird im Beinverlauf schmaler. Sie kann umgekrempelt oder normal getragen werden. Mit unserem klassischen "Squiggle"-Logo-Design.
configurable.i18n_product_moreaboutthefit_nl: De Josefina is onze ultrasmalle boyfriend-snit. Deze broek is ietwat ruimer aan de dijen, smaller aan de benen en loopt taps naar beneden tot een smalle pijp. Je kan hem dragen met of zonder omslag en hij heeft de A very expensive brand-squiggle op de achterzak.
configurable.i18n_product_moreaboutthefit_fr: Le Josefina est notre jean boyfriend skinny. Il est légèrement ample au niveau des cuisses, slim le long des jambes et resserré en bas. Il peut être porté avec ou sans revers et ses poches arrière sont ornées du logo brodé A very expensive brand.
configurable.i18n_product_moreaboutthefit_it: Josefina è il nostro boyfriend in versione skinny. Il suo taglio è leggermente più ampio sulle cosce, aderente attorno alla gamba e stretto in fondo. Da indossare con o senza risvolto, sfoggia il logo ricamato di A very expensive brand sulla tasca posteriore.
configurable.i18n_product_moreaboutthefit_es: The Josefina is our skinny boyfriend fit. It’s slightly roomy through the thigh, slim through the leg and tapers to a narrow leg opening. It can be worn cuffed or un-cuffed and features A very expensive brand’s signature squiggle back pocket.
